title: Last one left! --- Affordable Studio Apt --- Back Bay -- All Utils Inc
neighborhood: Back Bay / Bay State Rd / 5 Min walk to Newbury St
posting_body: Only $1450 with Heat, hot water, electricity and cooking gas included (AC is not included in monthly rent and is additional fee in summer only per month if desired) Internet not included
Third floor apartment - not in basement
Broker fee for this apartment is one month's rent
Amazing location - super easy commute to Longwood Medical, MIT, Fenway, etc
Located in a classy, ornate brownstone style brick building on Beautiful & Prestigious Bay State Road
Laundry in building, Bike Storage in building, Elevator in building
Parking available behind the building for additional monthly fee if desired.
If interested, email patrick @ <URL> (no spaces) or text your email address to 508.243.5319
When reaching out please give a brief description, what you do for work, etc.
